heading: Natural Wonders of the USA
storydescription: Discover America’s most breathtaking natural landmarks — from towering mountains and pristine lakes to majestic canyons and untouched coastlines. Explore the beauty that makes each destination truly unforgettable.

stories.title: New York City, New York
stories.description: The Statue of Liberty, Times Square, Central Park, Broadway shows, world-class museums...

stories.title: Los Angeles, California
stories.description: Hollywood, Santa Monica Pier, Venice Beach, Universal Studios, vibrant arts scene....

stories.title: Las Vegas, Nevada
stories.description: Famous casinos and nightlife, the Strip, world-class entertainment, nearby natural attractions like Red Rock Canyon......

stories.title: Orlando, Florida
stories.description: Theme parks including Walt Disney World, Universal Studios, SeaWorld, family-friendly attractions......
